TopicTitle: Should there be a save as feature in the vab/sph?

Articles.Content: I was playing with my brother and we were flying multiple missions of the same ish ship and wondered wouldn't it be nice to save a ship like a duplicate with your changes and not have it remove the last save so you could label your rockets like test1 test2... And have a "series" of rockets in the load area tell me what you think game devs pls add in next update
You can do that. Just change the name and save....

You know if you type a name in the box where it says "Untitled Craft" it will save the ship under that name. then you can load from a list of all your vessels? Just call them "ship 1", "ship 2" and it will save them as different files
It would be nice to be able to tweak your rocket then save it as a new instead of replacing its previous design
Change the name in the box at the top.

You already asked this question and you were all ready answered by multiple people that you can already do that by simply changing the rocket's name, or adding a number on the end.

Please stop making duplicate threads.

EDIT: A wild moderator has appeared! He used Merge. It was super effective!

Edited March 16, 2016 by Rocket In My Pocket
Guess what, it's one thread now
Maybe he didn't create 2 threads, and actually just changed the name of his thread, causing it to save a new one.
